div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 818 Roksolany (anc. Niconium), Ovidio- pol' raion, Odessa oblast, Ukraine, 1960 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. (Golenko) Contents: 4 AR Philip II: 1 tetradr. (Pella; var. Müller 78) Istrus: 2 dr. (as AMNG I.1, pl. 2, 21) Amisus: 1 dr. (as RGA I.1, pl. 6, 18, with ΑΙΓϒ, ΗΓ) Disposition: Odessa † Karyszkowski, VDI 1961, no.4, pp. 109-12 Zaginailo, MASP 5 (1966), pp. 111-2, 125, nos. 174-5, 179-80
